TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PerformanceCounterCategory extends System.Object

summary.span: Represents a performance object, which defines a category of performance counters.

span.span: Represents a performance object, which defines a category of performance counters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 建立或刪除效能計數器需要同步處理的基礎程式碼使用具名的 mutex。Creating or deleting a performance counter requires synchronization of the underlying code by using a named mutex. 如果高特殊權限的應用程式鎖定具名的 mutex，嘗試建立或刪除效能計數器就會導致應用程式停止回應，直到釋放鎖定為止。If a highly privileged application locks the named mutex, attempts to create or delete a performance counter causes the application to stop responding until the lock is released. 若要避免這個問題，永遠不會授與不受信任的程式碼的權限。To help avoid this problem, never grant permission to untrusted code. 颾魤 ㄛ權限可能會允許略過其他權限，以及只應該授與高度信任程式碼。In addition, permission potentially allows other permissions to be bypassed and should only be granted to highly trusted code. 執行個體的屬性會顯示在效能檢視器應用程式的 [新增計數器] 對話方塊的 [效能物件] 欄位。The instance's property is displayed in the Performance Object field of the Performance Viewer application's Add Counter dialog box. 類別提供數種方法可以互動計數器和電腦上的分類。The class provides several methods for interacting with counters and categories on the computer. 方法可讓您定義自訂類別。The methods enable you to define custom categories. 方法可用來從電腦移除類別目錄。The method provides a way to remove categories from the computer. 方法可讓您檢視類別清單，而擷取所有計數器與執行個體資料相關聯的單一類別。The method enables you to view the list of categories, while retrieves all the counter and instance data associated with a single category. 效能計數器會發行有關應用程式的效能資料。A performance counter publishes performance data about an application. 類別包含實體的元件 （例如處理器、 磁碟和記憶體） 和系統物件 （例如處理程序和執行緒）。Categories include physical components (such as processors, disks, and memory) and system objects (such as processes and threads). 系統與相同的效能物件相關的計數器會分組為類別，表示其一般的焦點。System counters that are related to the same performance object are grouped into a category that indicates their common focus. 當您建立的執行個體類別，您先指出與其元件將互動，而且然後從該類別選取計數器的分類。When you create an instance of the class, you first indicate the category with which the component will interact, and then you choose a counter from that category. 比方說，一個 Windows 計數器分類是 [記憶體] 類別。For example, one Windows counter category is the Memory category. 此類別內的系統計數器會追蹤記憶體的資料，例如可用的位元組數目和快取的位元組數目。System counters within this category track memory data such as the number of bytes available and the number of bytes cached. 如果您想要使用 在您的應用程式中快取的位元組，您會建立的執行個體元件，將它連接到 記憶體 類別中，，，然後挑選該類別的適當計數器 （在此案例中，快取的位元組為單位）。If you wanted to work with the bytes cached in your application, you would create an instance of the component, connect it to the Memory category, and then pick the appropriate counter (in this case, Cached Bytes) from that category. 雖然您的系統提供許多其他的計數器類別，您可能將互動最常使用的類別會快取、 記憶體、 物件、 PhysicalDisk、 程序、 處理器、 伺服器、 系統和執行緒的類別。Although your system makes many more counter categories available, the categories that you will probably interact with most frequently are the Cache, Memory, Objects, PhysicalDisk, Process, Processor, Server, System, and Thread categories. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法中的類別會在發行的計數器，以及如果該類別選取重複使用的選項，則會重複使用的計數器執行個體。The method in the class will release the counter and, if the reuse option is selected for that category, the instance of the counter will be reused. 如果另一個處理序或甚至是另一個部分，程式碼會嘗試寫入計數器執行個體，這可能會造成競爭情形。This could cause a race condition if another process or even another part of the code is trying to write to the counter instance. > [!NOTE] > 強烈建議在應用程式的安裝期間，不會在應用程式執行期間，建立新的效能計數器分類。It is strongly recommended that new performance counter categories be created during the installation of the application, not during the execution of the application. 這可讓作業系統重新整理其已註冊的效能計數器分類清單的時間。This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered performance counter categories. 如果清單不會重新整理，則嘗試使用 「 類別目錄將會失敗。If the list has not been refreshed, the attempt to use the category will fail. > [!NOTE] > 與安裝的效能計數器分類[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]使用不同的共用的記憶體，且每個效能計數器分類都有它自己的記憶體。Performance counter categories installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] use separate shared memory, with each performance counter category having its own memory. 您可以指定不同的共用記憶體的大小，藉由建立 DWORD 登錄機碼 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services 中名為 FileMappingSize\\*\<類別名稱 >* \效能。You can specify the size of separate shared memory by creating a DWORD named FileMappingSize in the registry key HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\\*\* \Performance. FileMappingSize 值設定為類別目錄的共用的記憶體大小。The FileMappingSize value is set to the shared memory size of the category. 預設大小為 131072 十進位。The default size is 131072 decimal. FileMappingSize 值不存在，如果`fileMappingSize`屬性值`performanceCounters`使用 Machine.config 檔案中指定的項目時，造成額外負擔的組態檔處理。If the FileMappingSize value is not present, the `fileMappingSize` attribute value for the `performanceCounters` element specified in the Machine.config file is used, causing additional overhead for configuration file processing. 您可以藉由設定登錄中的檔案對應大小，達成應用程式啟動的效能改善。You can realize a performance improvement for application startup by setting the file mapping size in the registry. 如需有關檔案對應大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[ <performanceCounters>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/performancecounters-element.md)。For more information about the file mapping size, see [<performanceCounters>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/performancecounters-element.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會判斷是否及其存在於本機電腦或另一部電腦上。The following code example determines whether a and its exist on the local computer or on another computer. 如果這些物件不存在本機電腦上，此範例 （選擇性） 會建立它們。If these objects do not exist on the local computer, the example optionally creates them. 它會使用方法，以判斷是否存在。It uses the method to determine whether the exists. 如果不存在並沒有計數器指定名稱，或如果電腦是在遠端電腦，範例就會結束。If the does not exist and no counter name is specified, or if the computer is a remote machine, the example exits. 如果提供名稱，此範例會使用方法，並向使用者顯示結果。If a name is provided, the example uses the method and displays the result to the user. 如果不存在，使用者可以刪除並重建與新。If the does not exist, the user can delete and re-create the with the new . 如果使用者這麼做，類別也會刪除使用方法。If the user does so, the category is deleted using the method. 如果要求，此範例現在會建立新並使用方法。If requested, the example now creates the new and using the method. 如果指定執行個體名稱，則此範例會使用方法，並顯示結果。If an instance name is specified, the example uses the method and displays the result. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategory.Class#27](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategory.Class/CS/perfcountercatcreateexist.cs#27)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategory.Class#27](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategory.Class/VB/perfcountercatcreateexist.vb#27)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出是否物件可以有多個執行個體。The property indicates whether the object can have multiple instances. 可能的值為， ，或。The possible values are , , or . 有兩種類型的效能計數器類別： 單一執行個體和多重執行個體。There are two types of performance counter categories: single-instance and multi-instance. 根據預設，類別會是單一執行個體，當它已建立，並新增另一個執行個體時，成為多重執行個體。By default, a category is single-instance when it is created and becomes multi-instance when another instance is added. 設定應用程式，並在執行階段加入執行個體時，會建立類別目錄。Categories are created when an application is set up, and instances are added at run time. 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，不需要知道的效能計數器分類是多重執行個體或單一執行個體。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, it is not necessary to know if a performance counter category is multi-instance or single-instance. 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，則列舉型別用來表示效能計數器是否可以具有多個執行個體。In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the enumeration is used to indicate whether a performance counter can have multiple instances.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必須設定之前呼叫這個方法的屬性。You must set the property before calling this method. 否則，會擲回例外狀況。Otherwise, an exception is thrown. 如果您沒有設定屬性，這個方法會使用本機電腦 ("。")。If you have not set the property, this method uses the local computer ("."). > [!NOTE] > 若要讀取效能計數器，在 Windows Vista 和更新版本，Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003，您必須是 Performance Monitor Users 群組的成員，或具有系統管理權限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista and later, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免在為了無法提升您的權限來存取效能計數器，在 Windows Vista 和更新版本，請將您自己新增至 Performance Monitor Users 群組。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista and later, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista (含) 以後版本中，使用者帳戶控制 (UAC) 會判斷使用者的權限。In Windows Vista and later, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是內建 Administrators 群組的成員，系統會將兩個執行階段存取語彙基元 (Token) 指派給您：標準使用者存取語彙基元及管理員存取語彙基元。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 根據預設，您會屬於標準使用者角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要執行存取效能計數器的程式碼，您必須先將您的權限從標準使用者提高為系統管理員。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 您可以在啟動應用程式時，以滑鼠右鍵按一下應用程式圖示，並指出您想要以系統管理員身分執行，藉此提高為系統管理員權限。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會判斷是否存在。The following code example determines whether a exists. 它會取得類別名稱、 計數器名稱和電腦名稱從命令列中，如果您授與他們。It gets a category name, counter name, and computer name from the command line, if they are given. 它會建立物件使用適當。It creates a object using the appropriate . 然後它會使用方法，以判斷是否指定存在，而且會通知使用者。It then uses the method to determine whether the specified exists, and informs the user. remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 若要讀取效能計數器，在 Windows Vista 和更新版本，Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003，您必須是 Performance Monitor Users 群組的成員，或具有系統管理權限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista and later, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免在為了無法提升您的權限來存取效能計數器，在 Windows Vista 和更新版本，請將您自己新增至 Performance Monitor Users 群組。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista and later, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista (含) 以後版本中，使用者帳戶控制 (UAC) 會判斷使用者的權限。In Windows Vista and later, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是內建 Administrators 群組的成員，系統會將兩個執行階段存取語彙基元 (Token) 指派給您：標準使用者存取語彙基元及管理員存取語彙基元。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 根據預設，您會屬於標準使用者角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要執行存取效能計數器的程式碼，您必須先將您的權限從標準使用者提高為系統管理員。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 您可以在啟動應用程式時，以滑鼠右鍵按一下應用程式圖示，並指出您想要以系統管理員身分執行，藉此提高為系統管理員權限。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會判斷是否存在。The following code example determines whether a exists. 它會取得類別名稱、 計數器名稱和電腦名稱從命令列中，如果您授與他們。It gets a category name, counter name, and computer name from the command line, if they are given. 它會使用靜態的多載方法，以判斷是否指定名稱存在於。It uses the static overloads of the method to determine whether the specified name exists in the . 多載被根據是否提供電腦名稱。The overload is selected based on whether a computer name is provided. remarks.format: ## Remarks `categoryType`參數指定的效能計數器分類是否是單一執行個體或多重執行個體。The `categoryType` parameter specifies whether the performance counter category is single-instance or multi-instance. 根據預設，類別會是單一執行個體，當它已建立，並新增另一個執行個體時，成為多重執行個體。By default, a category is single-instance when it is created and becomes multi-instance when another instance is added. 設定應用程式，並在執行階段加入執行個體時，會建立類別目錄。Categories are created when an application is set up, and instances are added at run time. 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，不需要知道的效能計數器分類是多重執行個體或單一執行個體。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, it is not necessary to know if a performance counter category is multi-instance or single-instance. 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，則列舉型別用來表示效能計數器是否可以具有多個執行個體。In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the enumeration is used to indicate whether a performance counter can have multiple instances. 與安裝的效能計數器分類[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]使用不同的共用的記憶體，且每個效能計數器分類都有它自己的記憶體。Performance counter categories installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] use separate shared memory, with each performance counter category having its own memory. 您可以指定不同的共用記憶體的大小，藉由建立 DWORD 登錄機碼 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services 中名為 FileMappingSize\\*\<類別名稱 >* \效能。You can specify the size of separate shared memory by creating a DWORD named FileMappingSize in the registry key HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\\*\* \Performance. FileMappingSize 值設定為類別目錄的共用的記憶體大小。The FileMappingSize value is set to the shared memory size of the category. 預設大小為 131072 十進位。The default size is 131072 decimal. FileMappingSize 值不存在，如果`fileMappingSize`屬性值`performanceCounters`使用 Machine.config 檔案中指定的項目時，造成額外負擔的組態檔處理。If the FileMappingSize value is not present, the `fileMappingSize` attribute value for the `performanceCounters` element specified in the Machine.config file is used, causing additional overhead for configuration file processing. 您可以藉由設定登錄中的檔案對應大小，達成應用程式啟動的效能改善。You can realize a performance improvement for application startup by setting the file mapping size in the registry. > [!NOTE] > 強烈建議在應用程式的安裝期間，不會在應用程式執行期間，建立新的效能計數器分類。It is strongly recommended that new performance counter categories be created during the installation of the application, not during the execution of the application. 這可讓作業系統重新整理其已註冊的效能計數器分類清單的時間。This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered performance counter categories. 如果清單不會重新整理，則嘗試使用 「 類別目錄將會失敗。If the list has not been refreshed, the attempt to use the category will fail. > [!NOTE] > 若要讀取效能計數器，在 Windows Vista 和更新版本，Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003，您必須是 Performance Monitor Users 群組的成員，或具有系統管理權限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista and later, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免在為了無法提升您的權限來存取效能計數器，在 Windows Vista 和更新版本，請將您自己新增至 Performance Monitor Users 群組。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista and later, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista (含) 以後版本中，使用者帳戶控制 (UAC) 會判斷使用者的權限。In Windows Vista and later, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是內建 Administrators 群組的成員，系統會將兩個執行階段存取語彙基元 (Token) 指派給您：標準使用者存取語彙基元及管理員存取語彙基元。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 根據預設，您會屬於標準使用者角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要執行存取效能計數器的程式碼，您必須先將您的權限從標準使用者提高為系統管理員。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 您可以在啟動應用程式時，以滑鼠右鍵按一下應用程式圖示，並指出您想要以系統管理員身分執行，藉此提高為系統管理員權限。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 範例會示範如何建立自訂的多重執行個體的效能計數器分類的每秒的訂單數目。The example shows how to create a custom, multi-instance performance counter category for the number of orders per second. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategoryType#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategoryType/CS/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategoryType#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategoryType/VB/program.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 若要讀取效能計數器，在 Windows Vista 和更新版本，Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003，您必須是 Performance Monitor Users 群組的成員，或具有系統管理權限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista and later, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免在為了無法提升您的權限來存取效能計數器，在 Windows Vista 和更新版本，請將您自己新增至 Performance Monitor Users 群組。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista and later, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista (含) 以後版本中，使用者帳戶控制 (UAC) 會判斷使用者的權限。In Windows Vista and later, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是內建 Administrators 群組的成員，系統會將兩個執行階段存取語彙基元 (Token) 指派給您：標準使用者存取語彙基元及管理員存取語彙基元。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 根據預設，您會屬於標準使用者角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要執行存取效能計數器的程式碼，您必須先將您的權限從標準使用者提高為系統管理員。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 您可以在啟動應用程式時，以滑鼠右鍵按一下應用程式圖示，並指出您想要以系統管理員身分執行，藉此提高為系統管理員權限。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立和單一與說明文字分別使用方法。The following code example creates a and single with help text for each, using the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks `categoryType`參數指定的效能計數器分類是否是單一執行個體或多重執行個體。The `categoryType` parameter specifies whether the performance counter category is single-instance or multi-instance. 根據預設，類別會是單一執行個體，當它已建立，並新增另一個執行個體時，成為多重執行個體。By default, a category is single-instance when it is created and becomes multi-instance when another instance is added. 設定應用程式，並在執行階段加入執行個體時，會建立類別目錄。Categories are created when an application is set up, and instances are added at run time. 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，不需要知道的效能計數器分類是多重執行個體或單一執行個體。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, it is not necessary to know if a performance counter category is multi-instance or single-instance. 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，則列舉型別用來表示效能計數器是否可以具有多個執行個體。In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the enumeration is used to indicate whether a performance counter can have multiple instances. 與安裝的效能計數器分類[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]使用不同的共用的記憶體，且每個效能計數器分類都有它自己的記憶體。Performance counter categories installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] use separate shared memory, with each performance counter category having its own memory. 您可以指定不同的共用記憶體的大小，藉由建立 DWORD 登錄機碼 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services 中名為 FileMappingSize\\*\<類別名稱 >* \效能。You can specify the size of separate shared memory by creating a DWORD named FileMappingSize in the registry key HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\\*\* \Performance. FileMappingSize 值設定為類別目錄的共用的記憶體大小。The FileMappingSize value is set to the shared memory size of the category. 預設大小為 131072 十進位。The default size is 131072 decimal. FileMappingSize 值不存在，如果`fileMappingSize`屬性值`performanceCounters`使用 Machine.config 檔案中指定的項目時，造成額外負擔的組態檔處理。If the FileMappingSize value is not present, the `fileMappingSize` attribute value for the `performanceCounters` element specified in the Machine.config file is used, causing additional overhead for configuration file processing. 您可以藉由設定登錄中的檔案對應大小，達成應用程式啟動的效能改善。You can realize a performance improvement for application startup by setting the file mapping size in the registry. > [!NOTE] > 強烈建議在應用程式的安裝期間，不會在應用程式執行期間，建立新的效能計數器分類。It is strongly recommended that new performance counter categories be created during the installation of the application, not during the execution of the application. 這可讓作業系統重新整理其已註冊的效能計數器分類清單的時間。This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered performance counter categories. 如果清單不會重新整理，則嘗試使用 「 類別目錄將會失敗。If the list has not been refreshed, the attempt to use the category will fail. > [!NOTE] > 若要讀取效能計數器，在 Windows Vista 和更新版本，Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003，您必須是 Performance Monitor Users 群組的成員，或具有系統管理權限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista and later, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免在為了無法提升您的權限來存取效能計數器，在 Windows Vista 和更新版本，請將您自己新增至 Performance Monitor Users 群組。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista and later, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista (含) 以後版本中，使用者帳戶控制 (UAC) 會判斷使用者的權限。In Windows Vista and later, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是內建 Administrators 群組的成員，系統會將兩個執行階段存取語彙基元 (Token) 指派給您：標準使用者存取語彙基元及管理員存取語彙基元。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 根據預設，您會屬於標準使用者角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要執行存取效能計數器的程式碼，您必須先將您的權限從標準使用者提高為系統管理員。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 您可以在啟動應用程式時，以滑鼠右鍵按一下應用程式圖示，並指出您想要以系統管理員身分執行，藉此提高為系統管理員權限。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此範例示範如何建立自訂的單一執行個體的效能計數器分類。The example shows how to create a custom, single instance performance counter category. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategoryType#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategoryType/CS/program.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategoryType#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategoryType/VB/program.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以從系統刪除自訂效能計數器分類。You can delete only custom performance counter categories from the system. 您無法刪除計數器從 類別目錄。You cannot delete a counter from a category. 若要這樣做，請刪除分類，並重新建立與您想要保留的計數器分類。To do so, delete the category and recreate the category with the counters you want to retain. 若要避免例外狀況，請確認類別目錄存在，在您嘗試將它刪除。To avoid an exception, confirm that the category exists before you attempt to delete it. > [!NOTE] > 若要讀取效能計數器，在 Windows Vista 和更新版本，Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003，您必須是 Performance Monitor Users 群組的成員，或具有系統管理權限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista and later, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免在為了無法提升您的權限來存取效能計數器，在 Windows Vista 和更新版本，請將您自己新增至 Performance Monitor Users 群組。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista and later, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista (含) 以後版本中，使用者帳戶控制 (UAC) 會判斷使用者的權限。In Windows Vista and later, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是內建 Administrators 群組的成員，系統會將兩個執行階段存取語彙基元 (Token) 指派給您：標準使用者存取語彙基元及管理員存取語彙基元。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 根據預設，您會屬於標準使用者角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要執行存取效能計數器的程式碼，您必須先將您的權限從標準使用者提高為系統管理員。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 您可以在啟動應用程式時，以滑鼠右鍵按一下應用程式圖示，並指出您想要以系統管理員身分執行，藉此提高為系統管理員權限。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用方法來刪除而它所包含的物件。The following code example uses the method to delete a and the objects that it contains. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用時在電腦上的所有效能計數器會都檢查可用性的方法可能造成明顯的效能影響。Use of the method can result in a noticeable performance penalty while all performance counters on the machine are checked for availability. 如果您只會寫入效能計數器，您可以避免時已安裝的應用程式，且假設類別目錄有存取計數器時，建立效能計數器的效能計數器的全域搜尋。If you are only writing to a performance counter, you can avoid the global search for performance counters by creating the performance counter when the application is installed and assuming the category exists when accessing the counter. 沒有任何方法可避免從效能計數器讀取時的效能計數器搜尋。There is no way to avoid the performance counter search when reading from performance counters. > [!NOTE] > 若要讀取效能計數器，在 Windows Vista 和更新版本，Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003，您必須是 Performance Monitor Users 群組的成員，或具有系統管理權限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista and later, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免在為了無法提升您的權限來存取效能計數器，在 Windows Vista 和更新版本，請將您自己新增至 Performance Monitor Users 群組。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista and later, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista (含) 以後版本中，使用者帳戶控制 (UAC) 會判斷使用者的權限。In Windows Vista and later, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是內建 Administrators 群組的成員，系統會將兩個執行階段存取語彙基元 (Token) 指派給您：標準使用者存取語彙基元及管理員存取語彙基元。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 根據預設，您會屬於標準使用者角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要執行存取效能計數器的程式碼，您必須先將您的權限從標準使用者提高為系統管理員。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 您可以在啟動應用程式時，以滑鼠右鍵按一下應用程式圖示，並指出您想要以系統管理員身分執行，藉此提高為系統管理員權限。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會判斷是否名為"orders"物件存在。The following code example determines whether a object named "orders" exists. 如果沒有，它會建立物件使用物件，其中包含兩個效能計數器。If not, it creates the object by using a object that contains two performance counters. user. 如果您是內建 Administrators 群組的成員，系統會將兩個執行階段存取語彙基元 (Token) 指派給您：標準使用者存取語彙基元及管理員存取語彙基元。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 根據預設，您會屬於標準使用者角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要執行存取效能計數器的程式碼，您必須先將您的權限從標準使用者提高為系統管理員。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 您可以在啟動應用程式時，以滑鼠右鍵按一下應用程式圖示，並指出您想要以系統管理員身分執行，藉此提高為系統管理員權限。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. ## Examples 下列範例會判斷是否名為物件`Orders`存在。The following example determines whether a object named `Orders` exists. 如果不存在，此範例會建立物件使用物件，其中包含兩個效能計數器。If it does not exist, the example creates the object by using a object that contains two performance counters. remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 若要讀取效能計數器，在 Windows Vista 和更新版本，Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003，您必須是 Performance Monitor Users 群組的成員，或具有系統管理權限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista and later, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免在為了無法提升您的權限來存取效能計數器，在 Windows Vista 和更新版本，請將您自己新增至 Performance Monitor Users 群組。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista and later, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista (含) 以後版本中，使用者帳戶控制 (UAC) 會判斷使用者的權限。In Windows Vista and later, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是內建 Administrators 群組的成員，系統會將兩個執行階段存取語彙基元 (Token) 指派給您：標準使用者存取語彙基元及管理員存取語彙基元。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 根據預設，您會屬於標準使用者角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要執行存取效能計數器的程式碼，您必須先將您的權限從標準使用者提高為系統管理員。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 您可以在啟動應用程式時，以滑鼠右鍵按一下應用程式圖示，並指出您想要以系統管理員身分執行，藉此提高為系統管理員權限。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用方法傳回的陣列物件從本機電腦或指定的電腦。The following code example uses the method to return an array of objects from the local computer or a specified computer. 它會將轉換成類別目錄名稱，它會排序並顯示使用者的陣列的陣列。It converts the array into an array of category names, which it sorts and displays for the user. 多載會根據是否已指定電腦名稱選取。The overload is selected based on whether a computer name was specified. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載不是`static`。This overload of is not `static`. 它會要求您建立物件，並設定屬性。It requires you to create a object and to set the property. > [!NOTE] > 若要讀取效能計數器，在 Windows Vista 和更新版本，Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003，您必須是 Performance Monitor Users 群組的成員，或具有系統管理權限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista and later, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免在為了無法提升您的權限來存取效能計數器，在 Windows Vista 和更新版本，請將您自己新增至 Performance Monitor Users 群組。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista and later, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista (含) 以後版本中，使用者帳戶控制 (UAC) 會判斷使用者的權限。In Windows Vista and later, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是內建 Administrators 群組的成員，系統會將兩個執行階段存取語彙基元 (Token) 指派給您：標準使用者存取語彙基元及管理員存取語彙基元。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 根據預設，您會屬於標準使用者角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要執行存取效能計數器的程式碼，您必須先將您的權限從標準使用者提高為系統管理員。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 您可以在啟動應用程式時，以滑鼠右鍵按一下應用程式圖示，並指出您想要以系統管理員身分執行，藉此提高為系統管理員權限。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會判斷是否執行個體存在於。The following code example determines whether a instance exists within a . 它會先建立物件，使用適當的建構函式為基礎的電腦名稱是否已指定。It first creates a object, using the appropriate constructor based on whether a computer name was specified. 然後它會使用來判斷指定的執行個體是否存在，則會通知使用者。It then uses to determine whether the specified instance exists, then informs the user. 如果未不指定任何執行個體名稱，則此範例會使用預設的單一執行個體名稱。If no instance name is specified, the example uses the default single-instance name. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必須設定屬性，然後再呼叫。You must set the property before you call . 一次讀取整個類別可以是效率不如讀取單一計數器，因為系統會提供資料的方式。Reading the entire category at once can be as efficient as reading a single counter because of the way that the system provides the data. > [!NOTE] > 若要讀取效能計數器，在 Windows Vista 和更新版本，Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003，您必須是 Performance Monitor Users 群組的成員，或具有系統管理權限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista and later, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免在為了無法提升您的權限來存取效能計數器，在 Windows Vista 和更新版本，請將您自己新增至 Performance Monitor Users 群組。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista and later, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista (含) 以後版本中，使用者帳戶控制 (UAC) 會判斷使用者的權限。In Windows Vista and later, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是內建 Administrators 群組的成員，系統會將兩個執行階段存取語彙基元 (Token) 指派給您：標準使用者存取語彙基元及管理員存取語彙基元。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 根據預設，您會屬於標準使用者角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要執行存取效能計數器的程式碼，您必須先將您的權限從標準使用者提高為系統管理員。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 您可以在啟動應用程式時，以滑鼠右鍵按一下應用程式圖示，並指出您想要以系統管理員身分執行，藉此提高為系統管理員權限。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立指定名稱。The following code example creates a for a specified name. 然後它會使用返回所包含的所有執行個體的執行個體資料物件內。It then uses to return an that contains instance data for all the instances of the objects within the .
